definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
to bend/bent/a bend/a turn (in the road etc)/CL:道[dao4]
variant of 臺灣|台湾[Tai2 wan1]
Liwan district of Guangzhou city 廣州市|广州市[Guang3 zhou1 shi4], Guangdong

sentences.english: Here are the three steps of drawing a sketch map of Siu Sai Wan.
sentences.chinese: 以下是繪畫小西灣略圖的三個步驟。

sentences.english: A diver explores wire coral in Japan's Suruga Bay.
sentences.chinese: 一位潛水者探險鐵絲珊瑚在日本的Suruga灣。

sentences.english: The Monterey Bay Aquarium shows visitors the underwater life in the bay.
sentences.chinese: 蒙特裏灣水族館向遊客展現了該海灣裏的海洋生物。

sentences.english: A middling placer deposit of tin has been discovered in Jiudaowan district.
sentences.chinese: 九道灣地區已發現中型砂錫礦牀。

sentences.english: Ok, now the place we are coming to is the Shengtangwan.
sentences.chinese: 好了，現在我們來到的地方就是神堂灣。

sentences.english: Diana Sterling lived in the Back Bay, only half a mile from your residence.
sentences.chinese: 斯黛安住在巴克灣，離你的寓所不到一公里。

sentences.english: The Viking warship replica, Havhingsten af Glendalough (the Sea Stallion of Glendalough), makes its way from Dublin Bay into Dublin Port, Ireland August 14, 2007 .
sentences.chinese: 北歐海盜船複製品從愛爾蘭柏林灣航行到柏林港口。

sentences.english: It's said people standing on the bridge can see the most beautiful scenery of Wolong Lake.
sentences.chinese: 聽說在那橋上可以看到臥龍灣最美的景色。

sentences.english: Motocycle trip to Half Moon Bay.
Hello everybody, I'm glad to come here to study English with you .
sentences.chinese: 很高興有這次機會到藍波灣英語口語。

sentences.english: Bodhi fine sand beach has a clear head.
The spatial niche of dominate forest populations in Baihuwan forest regions were discussed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 對百戶灣森林羣落優勢種羣空間生態位進行了研究。

sentences.english: After crossing Owl Creek, on the road to Poplar Cove, there are three large trees.
sentences.chinese: 後橫過道路奧爾河，楊樹灣，有三個大的樹木。

sentences.english: Now we see the Moon Bay area, there are known stone flower kingdom.
sentences.chinese: 目前我們看到的月亮灣景區，有石花王國著稱。

sentences.english: Corregidor:an island of the northern Philippines at the entrance to Manila Bay.
sentences.chinese: 灣入口處菲律賓羣島北部一個島。

definition: variant of 臺灣|台湾[Tai2 wan1]
opposite bank (of a body of water)
bilateral/both shores/both sides/both coasts/Taiwan and mainland
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)

local/regional/district (not necessarily formal administrative unit)/region/area/as suffix to city name, means prefecture or county (area administered by a prefecture-level city or county level city)/CL:個|个[ge4]
